Alix, lucene index XML

Packages 
Package Description
alix.fr
Language resources for French
alix.grep
A command line tool to produce statistics on texts, without indexing.
alix.grep.query
An automaton to query a stream of tokens.
alix.lucene
Main pilots for indexing and searching, see especially Alix
alix.lucene.analysis
Components for lexical analysis, especially for French.
alix.lucene.analysis.tokenattributes
Custom token attributes.
alix.lucene.search
Objects to search and calculate lexical statistics from an index (ex: found occurrences by facet)
alix.lucene.util
Data structures used for indexing AND searching (ex: co-occurrences)
alix.util
Generic data structures.
alix.web
Jsp tools
alix.xml
XML resources to index files in alix.
obvil.web
Driver of the OBVIL web application using Alix.
obvil.web.tags
Taglib for the OBVIL web application.
org.apache.lucene.analysis
Implementation of a custom Reuse Strategy (in lucene namespace because of Lucene accesibility choices)
